https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7jR8cXfPw0bXx4vc2YUlBxPbg0q.jpg Black Lightning is a Russian superhero film about a Moscow University student who discovers that his otherwise unremarkable car can fly. After his father is attacked, he decides to use the car to fight crime and becomes the city's defender against an evil millionaire. Black Lightning
